title: Tests for unified status: openspec reader and integration
description: Add unit tests for tasks.md parser (empty, all checked, mixed, multi-section). Add integration test: wai status with openspec/ present shows spec counts. Add integration test: wai status without openspec/ omits section gracefully. Add integration test: wai status -v shows detailed breakdown.
close_reason: Added 5 integration tests for OpenSpec status: with/without openspec, verbose breakdown, JSON with/without

title: Implement project state check
description: Validate .state YAML files across all projects. Part of add-doctor-command openspec change (openspec/changes/add-doctor-command/). Task 2.5.

title: Implement wai plugin enable <name>
description: Implement the 'wai plugin enable <name>' command. Currently stubbed with a 'not yet implemented' message in src/commands/plugin.rs. Per plugin-system spec, enabling a plugin should persist the enabled state so it's active for hooks, status, and command pass-through.

title: Integration test: uninitialised directory (error with init suggestion)
description: Add integration test for uninitialised directory that errors with init suggestion. Part of add-doctor-command openspec change (openspec/changes/add-doctor-command/). Task 4.6.

title: Investigate misleading error message in wai status
Implement config.toml validation check
description: Parse config.toml and report errors in wai doctor. Part of add-doctor-command openspec change (openspec/changes/add-doctor-command/). Task 2.2.

title: Implement agent config sync check
description: Validate .projections.yml and check target sync status. Part of add-doctor-command openspec change (openspec/changes/add-doctor-command/). Task 2.4.

title: Integration tests: missing plugin tools (warn)
description: Add integration test for missing plugin tools that produces a warning. Part of add-doctor-command openspec change (openspec/changes/add-doctor-command/). Task 4.4.

title: Wire on_phase_transition plugin hook
description: The plugin-system spec defines an on_phase_transition hook that should fire when a project changes phase. This hook is not currently wired in the phase transition code path. Need to call plugin::run_hooks(&project_root, "on_phase_transition") at the appropriate point.

title: Implement pass/warn/fail formatting with fix suggestions
description: Implement pass/warn/fail formatting with actionable fix suggestions per check. Part of add-doctor-command openspec change (openspec/changes/add-doctor-command/). Task 3.1.

title: Implement directory structure check
description: Verify PARA dirs exist under .wai/ (projects, areas, resources, archives, plugins). Part of add-doctor-command openspec change (openspec/changes/add-doctor-command/). Task 2.1.

title: Integration tests: healthy workspace (all checks pass)
description: Add integration test for healthy workspace where all doctor checks pass. Part of add-doctor-command openspec change (openspec/changes/add-doctor-command/). Task 4.1.

title: Implement summary line with counts and exit code
description: Summary line with pass/warn/fail counts and exit code (0 = all pass, 1 = any fail). Part of add-doctor-command openspec change (openspec/changes/add-doctor-command/). Task 3.2.

title: Integration tests: missing directories (fail with fix suggestion)
description: Add integration test for missing directories that fails with fix suggestion. Part of add-doctor-command openspec change (openspec/changes/add-doctor-command/). Task 4.2.

title: Implement progressive disclosure for help messages
description: The 'help-system' spec describes a progressive disclosure feature for help messages using verbosity flags (-v, -vv, -vvv). This feature is not implemented. For example, 'wai --help -v' does not show more information than 'wai --help'.

title: OpenSpec reader module: create src/openspec.rs with structs
description: Create src/openspec.rs with OpenSpecStatus and ChangeStatus structs. Implement read_status(project_root: &Path) -> Option<OpenSpecStatus> to scan openspec/specs/ for spec names. Implement scanning openspec/changes/ for active changes (excluding archive/). Implement tasks.md parser counting '- [ ]' vs '- [x]' lines, with per-section breakdown.

title: Add Doctor variant to Commands enum in src/cli.rs
description: Add `Doctor` variant to `Commands` enum in src/cli.rs. Part of add-doctor-command openspec change (openspec/changes/add-doctor-command/). Task 1.1.

title: Create src/commands/doctor.rs skeleton
description: Create src/commands/doctor.rs with `pub fn run() -> Result<()>` skeleton. Part of add-doctor-command openspec change (openspec/changes/add-doctor-command/). Task 1.3.

title: Integration tests: invalid state files (fail)
description: Add integration test for invalid state files that fails. Part of add-doctor-command openspec change (openspec/changes/add-doctor-command/). Task 4.5.

title: Add 'wai config edit' command
description: The 'cli-core' spec mentions 'wai config edit <path>' for managing agent configuration files, but this command is not implemented. The current 'wai config' command only has 'add' and 'list' subcommands.

title: Wire on_project_create plugin hook
description: The plugin-system spec defines an on_project_create hook that should fire when a new project is created. This hook is not currently wired in the project creation code path. Need to call plugin::run_hooks(&project_root, "on_project_create") at the appropriate point.

title: Implement custom plugin YAML validation check
description: Parse and validate YAML files in .wai/plugins/. Part of add-doctor-command openspec change (openspec/changes/add-doctor-command/). Task 2.6.

title: Wire verbosity into status command
description: Update status::run() signature to accept verbose: u8. Update dispatch in src/commands/mod.rs to pass cli.verbose to status::run(). Register mod openspec in src/main.rs.
close_reason: Implemented: verbose param threaded through mod.rs to status::run()

title: Implement wai plugin disable <name>
description: Implement the 'wai plugin disable <name>' command. Currently stubbed with a 'not yet implemented' message in src/commands/plugin.rs. Per plugin-system spec, disabling a plugin should persist the disabled state without removing its configuration.

title: Status output: add OpenSpec section
description: Add OpenSpec section to status::run() default output: summary counts + active changes with completion ratios. Add verbose output path (-v): list all spec names and per-section task breakdown. Ensure graceful skip when openspec/ directory doesn't exist.
close_reason: OpenSpec section added to status terminal+JSON output with verbose breakdown

title: Implement plugin tool availability check
description: Run which/command -v for detected plugin CLIs to verify availability. Part of add-doctor-command openspec change (openspec/changes/add-doctor-command/). Task 2.3.

title: Integration tests: invalid config.toml (fail with suggestion)
description: Add integration test for invalid config.toml that fails with suggestion. Part of add-doctor-command openspec change (openspec/changes/add-doctor-command/). Task 4.3.

title: Add mod doctor and dispatch arm in src/commands/mod.rs
description: Add `mod doctor` and dispatch arm in src/commands/mod.rs. Part of add-doctor-command openspec change (openspec/changes/add-doctor-command/). Task 1.2.
